issue.message: ArchTaskExecutor can only be called from within the same library group prefix (referenced groupId=`androidx.arch.core` with prefix androidx.arch from groupId=`androidx.lifecycle`)
TaskExecutor.executeOnMainThread can only be called from within the same library group prefix (referenced groupId=`androidx.arch.core` with prefix androidx.arch from groupId=`androidx.lifecycle`)
ArchTaskExecutor can only be called from within the same library group prefix (referenced groupId=`androidx.arch.core` with prefix androidx.arch from groupId=`androidx.lifecycle`)
TaskExecutor.executeOnMainThread can only be called from within the same library group prefix (referenced groupId=`androidx.arch.core` with prefix androidx.arch from groupId=`androidx.lifecycle`)
ArchTaskExecutor can only be called from within the same library group prefix (referenced groupId=`androidx.arch.core` with prefix androidx.arch from groupId=`androidx.lifecycle`)
TaskExecutor.executeOnMainThread can only be called from within the same library group prefix (referenced groupId=`androidx.arch.core` with prefix androidx.arch from groupId=`androidx.lifecycle`)

Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 1, "lifecycle", in androidx.lifecycle.LiveDataReactiveStreams.toPublisher) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions
